DOC.brief_title: Effects Tadalafil Once Day 12 Weeks Men With Signs Symptoms Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia
DOC.criteria: Men 40 year age old Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms ( LUTS ) total International Prostate Symptom Score ( IPSS ) great equal 13 Visit 1 . Agree use approve experimental medication Benign Prostate Hyperplasia ( BPH ) Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms , include alpha blocker , 5alpha reductase inhibitor , PDE5 inhibitor , herbal preparation time study . Have take finasteride dutasteride therapy least 4 month prior Visit 2 ; take LUTS therapy ( include herbal preparation ) PDE5 inhibitor least 4 week prior Visit 2 . Have BPHLUTS great 6 month prior Visit 1 . Any pelvic surgical procedure urinary tract , include minimally invasive BPHLUTS therapy penile implant surgery . History urethral obstruction due stricture , valve , sclerosis , tumor . Current neurologic disease condition associate neurogenic bladder ( example , Parkinson 's disease , multiple sclerosis ) . History cardiac condition include myocardial infarction , bypass surgery , angioplasty stent placement specify time start study . History angina require treatment nitrate . Prostate Specific Antigen ( PSA ) great 10 nanogram/milliliter ( ng/ml ) Visit 1 .
